backgrounds.name: bg-stone-01
backgrounds.prompt:
A high-resolution, photorealistic stone wall background inspired by the Houses of Parliament in London, blending restrained Gothic Revival civic architecture with post-war British brutalism.

The surface is composed of large limestone and concrete panels with subtle expansion joints and structural seams. Fine stone grain, gentle pitting, faint stains, and light soot accumulation are visible.

Lighting is calm and diffuse, as if under an overcast London sky. No hard shadows, no dramatic highlights, no directional spotlighting.

Architectural presence is implied through soft tonal shifts only, with no literal arches, carvings, or interior cathedral features.

Color palette is neutral limestone, ash gray, and muted warm stone tones. No strong color cast.

Contrast is restrained and even, with approximately 8â€“12% tonal variance across the frame to avoid banding.

The image should feel cinematic, dignified, and monumental, suitable as a UI environment background.

No text, no people, no props, no fantasy elements.

High spatial detail, realistic material texture, no painterly smoothing, designed to be upscaled later.

Negative: no neon or saturated colors, no dramatic lighting, no cathedral interiors, no fantasy, no text or symbols, no people.

Reduce visual drama. Flatten lighting. Remove theatrical mood. This is civic and restrained, not religious or cinematic fantasy.

backgrounds.name: bg-stone-02
backgrounds.prompt:
A high-resolution stone and concrete wall background inspired by British parliamentary architecture, combining subdued Gothic Revival proportions with mid-20th-century brutalist materiality.

The stone appears slightly darker and more weathered than the primary background, with faint vertical streaks from age and rain. Structural panel seams remain visible but understated.

Lighting remains soft and diffuse, with marginally deeper shadow pooling toward the edges of the frame.

Neutral ash, limestone, and charcoal tones only. Avoid cool blue or warm yellow casts.

Gentle contrast, smooth tonal transitions, no banding, no sharp highlights.

Calm, civic, and architectural rather than dramatic.

High spatial detail, realistic material texture, no painterly smoothing, designed to be upscaled later.

Negative: no neon or saturated colors, no dramatic lighting, no cathedral interiors, no fantasy, no text or symbols, no people.

Reduce visual drama. Flatten lighting. Remove theatrical mood. This is civic and restrained, not religious or cinematic fantasy.

overlays.name: overlay-vignette
overlays.prompt:
A subtle grayscale vignette overlay designed for modern interface composition.

Soft darkening around the edges of the frame, fading smoothly toward a neutral center.

Texture suggests faint soot and atmospheric haze rather than blur.

No visible hard edges, no obvious circular gradient, no banding.

Monochrome only.

Minimal, restrained, and architectural.

High spatial detail, realistic texture, no painterly smoothing, designed to be exported as an SVG overlay.

Reduce visual drama. Flatten lighting. Remove theatrical mood. This is civic and restrained, not religious or cinematic fantasy.

overlays.name: overlay-vault-ribs
overlays.prompt:
A subtle architectural shadow overlay inspired by the Gothic Revival interiors of the Palace of Westminster.

Soft, implied rib and arch shadows are cast across a flat surface, suggesting parliamentary vaulting without depicting a literal interior.

Shadows are diffuse, low-contrast, and incomplete, as if filtered through distance and time.

No ornate detailing, no cathedral drama, no sharp rib lines.

Grayscale only, very low opacity intent.

Designed as a scalable SVG overlay with smooth gradients and no hard edges.

Reduce visual drama. Flatten lighting. Remove theatrical mood. This is civic and restrained, not religious or cinematic fantasy.

overlays.name: overlay-tracery-corners
overlays.prompt:
A very subtle Gothic Revival tracery motif designed for use in the corners of a modern user interface.

Inspired by British parliamentary stonework, abstracted to near-geometry.

Lines are thin, broken, and fade rapidly into transparency.

No floral ornamentation, no medieval flourish.

Grayscale only.

Designed as an SVG overlay with extremely low visual dominance.

Reduce visual drama. Flatten lighting. Remove theatrical mood. This is civic and restrained, not religious or cinematic fantasy.

overlays.name: overlay-cracks
overlays.prompt:
A minimal hairline crack pattern inspired by stressed concrete and aged civic stone.

Cracks are thin, irregular, and sparse, with natural branching.

No dramatic fractures, no shattered stone, no rubble.

Grayscale only.

Designed as a seamless overlay intended to fade in gradually to suggest structural strain rather than destruction.

Reduce visual drama. Flatten lighting. Remove theatrical mood. This is civic and restrained, not religious or cinematic fantasy.

overlays.name: overlay-dust
overlays.prompt:
A sparse dust and debris speck overlay designed for subtle animation.

Tiny irregular particles of varying size, lightly and naturally distributed.

No smoke, no fog, no heavy clouds.

Grayscale only, very low density.

Designed as an overlay suitable for slow upward animation to suggest dust motes in still air.

Reduce visual drama. Flatten lighting. Remove theatrical mood. This is civic and restrained, not religious or cinematic fantasy.
